  class="b-flatbutton"                             name="action:login"                             tabindex="12"                             >Log in</button>                     </div>                     <div                         class="                             b-loginform-field                             b-loginform-create                             "                         >                         >Create an Account</a>                     </div>                 </div>              </form>              <!-- openid login form -->                              <form class="lj-openid-auth" action="http://www.livejournal.com/identity/login.bml?type=openid&auto_forwhat=user%24real-lawyer%24%2F520729.html" method="post">                     <div class="b-loginform-row">                         <label class="b-ljform-label">Your OpenID URL:</label>                     </div>                     <div class="b-loginform-row">  </button>                     </div>                 </form> <!-- /openid login form -->                       </div><!-- /loginform-body -->      </div><!-- /loginform -->          <div id="container" ng-app="S2Layout"><div id="container-inner"> <div id="page"><div id="page-inner"> <div id="message-window" class="hidden"></div> <div id="header"><div id="header-inner"> <div id="header-content"><div id="header-content-inner"> <div id="header-photo"> <div id="header-photo-inner"></div> </div> <div id="header-text"><ul class="nav"> <li class="item item-recent first"><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/" title="Recent Entries">Recent Entries</a></li><li class="item item-archive"><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/calendar" title="Archive">Archive</a></li><li class="item item-friends"><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/friends" title="Friends">Friends</a></li><li class="item item-userinfo"><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/profile" title="Profile">Profile</a></li><li class="item item-memories"><a href="http://www.livejournal.com/tools/memories.bml?user=real_lawyer" title="Memories">Memories</a></li>      </ul>     <div id="header-name"><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com">Tales from the Edge of Sanity</a>     </div>       <div id="header-description">Blogging since 2006, hanging on forever</div></div>     </div><span id="header-content-decor" class="decor"><b></b><u></u><s></s><i></i></span></div><!-- End Header Content -->     </div><span id="header-decor" class="decor"><b></b><u></u><s></s><i></i></span></div><!-- End Header --><div id="content"><div id="content-inner"> <div id="alpha"><div id="alpha-inner"> <p class="prevnext"><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/520524.html">Previous Entry</a></p>      <div id="asset-real_lawyer-520729" class="post-asset asset" lj-discovery-tags lj-screenable="social:widgets:parse">       <div class="asset-inner">         <div class="asset-header">           <div class="asset-header-inner">             <div class="asset-header-content">               <div class="asset-header-content-inner">                 <h2 class="asset-name page-header2"><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/520729.html" class="subj-link" >Tossed Salad Friday</a></h2>           <div class="asset-meta asset-entry-date">             <ul class="asset-meta-list">               <li class="item"><span><abbr class="datetime">Aug. 7th, 2015 at 7:30 AM</abbr></span></li>                            </ul>           </div>         </div></div></div>         </div> <!-- end asset-header -->         <div class="asset-content">             <div class="asset-body"><div class="user-icon">                 <span class="user-name-print"><span  class="ljuser  i-ljuser  i-ljuser-type-P     "  lj:user="real_lawyer" ><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/profile"  target="_self"  class="i-ljuser-profile" ><img  class="i-ljuser-userhead"  src="http://l-stat.livejournal.net/img/userinfo.gif?v=17080?v=129.4" /></a><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/" class="i-ljuser-username"   target="_self"   ><b>real_lawyer</b></a></span></span></div><span style="font-family:times new roman,serif;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;">~~ Sorry for the lack of political commentary today. &nbsp;I wrote this blog before I went to watch the GOP <strike>Circus</strike> Debate so could I munch on my popcorn and give the <strike>comedy show</strike> serious forum my full attention. I&rsquo;m not na&iuml;ve enough to think one of the <strike>performers</strike> politicians can&rsquo;t be elected by the same voters who gave W the thumbs up. </span></span><br /><div style="text-align:center"><img alt="popcorn a" src="http://ic.pics.livejournal.com/real_lawyer/10502141/118838/118838_300.jpg" style="line-height: 1.4;" title="popcorn a" /><br style="line-height: 1.4;" /><br /><span style="line-height: 1.4;"> </span></div><span style="font-family:times new roman,serif;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;">~~ The woman expressed frustration with her inability to quiet her mind. &ldquo;Ah, yes,&rdquo; said the other person. &ldquo;Being alone in one&rsquo;s mind is a terrible place to be.&rdquo;</span></span><br /> <br /><span style="font-family:times new roman,serif;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;">~~ Those who practice meditation often refer to the jungle-y nature of an active mind as &ldquo;monkey mind.&rdquo; &nbsp;It&rsquo;s a very apt description, though I sometimes think my mind is more like a TV set where the remote is malfunctioning and every channel is coming up rapidly and haphazardly while the volume control is decidedly stuck at high.</span></span><br /><div style="text-align:right"><img alt="file511249349101" src="http://ic.pics.livejournal.com/real_lawyer/10502141/119171/119171_300.jpg" style="line-height: 1.4;" title="file511249349101" /><br style="line-height: 1.4;" /><br /><span style="line-height: 1.4;"> </span></div><span style="font-family:times new roman,serif;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;">~~ I was at party last week where one of the guests was quite obnoxious to a server helping out the host. The guest was a boorish man in his late 50s and the seemingly lovely server looked to be about 20. As she passed our area with a tray of hors d&#39;oeuvres, he demanded, &ldquo;Where&rsquo;s the pigs in blankets?&rdquo; The first time she responded that she hadn&rsquo;t seen any, the second time she said there definitely weren&rsquo;t any in the kitchen, and by the third time he yelped, &ldquo;Where&rsquo;s the pigs in blankets?&rdquo; she quickly moved away. He sat there fuming and ranting about the lack of pigs in blankets at this party. &nbsp; </span></span><img alt="file8861312029879" src="http://ic.pics.livejournal.com/real_lawyer/10502141/119342/119342_300.jpg" title="file8861312029879" /><span style="font-family:times new roman,serif;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;"> </span></span><span style="font-family:times new roman,serif;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;">Geez, buddy, get over yourself.</span></span><span style="font-family: &amp;quot;times new roman&amp;quot;, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.3999996185303px;"> </span><span style="font-family:times new roman,serif;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;">Dead stuff wrapped in pastry does not a party make.</span></span><br /> <br /><span style="font-family:times new roman,serif;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;">~~ I met a very cool-looking woman in her 30s with spiky bi-colored hair, a nose ring, at least 20 bracelets, and tattoos everywhere. It was fun to chat with her &mdash; she was very animated as we spoke about dog rescues and veganism. She gave off a vibe that veered dramatically from her veneer, and that was before she hit me with the coup de foudre: her &ldquo;all-time favorite singer is Stephen Stills.&rdquo; I loved the one I was with!  </span></span><img alt="maxresdefault" src="http://ic.pics.livejournal.com/real_lawyer/10502141/119787/119787_300.jpg" title="maxresdefault" /><br /> <br /><span style="font-family:times new roman,serif;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;">~~ Did you know that even if you yell, &ldquo;Wait! Wait!&rdquo; to an appliance at the top of your lungs, it will pay you no heed at all?</span></span><br /> <br /><b><i><span style="font-family:times new roman,serif;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;">Have a wonderful weekend!</span></span></i></b><div style="text-align:center"><b><i><span style="color:#0070c0;"><span style="font-family:verdana,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;">LET&rsquo;S</span></span></span></i></b> <b><i><span style="color:#ff6600;"><span style="font-family:verdana,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;">GO</span></span></span></i></b> <b><i><span style="color:#0070c0;"><span style="font-family:verdana,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;">M</span></span></span></i></b><b><i><span style="color:#ff6600;"><span style="font-family:verdana,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;">E</span></span></span></i></b><b><i><span style="color:#0070c0;"><span style="font-family:verdana,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;">TS</span></span></span></i></b><b><i><span style="color:#ff6600;"><span style="font-family:verdana,sans-serif;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;">!</span></span></span></i></b></div></div> </div> <div class="quickreply" id="ljqrtentrycomment" style="display: none;"></div><div class="asset-meta asset-entry-links"> <ul class="asset-meta-list"> <li class="asset-meta-comments item asset-meta-no-comments item-reply"><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/520729.html?mode=reply" rel="nofollow">Leave a comment</a></li> <li class="asset-meta-comments item asset-meta-no-comments item-share"><a href="http://www.livejournal.com/update.bml?repost_type=c&amp;repost=http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/520729.html&amp;nodraft=1" class="js-lj-share" data-title="Tossed%20Salad%20Friday" data-url="http%3A%2F%2Freal-lawyer.livejournal.com%2F520729.html">Share</a></li><li class="asset-meta-comments item asset-meta-no-comments item-link"><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/520729.html">Link</a></li> </ul> </div>  <div class="asset-footer"></div> </div> </div> <div id="thread_loader_img" style="display:none;" ><img src="http://l-stat.livejournal.net/img/threadExpander.gif"></div></div></div> <div id="beta"><div id="beta-inner"> <div class="about-me-widget widget"> <div class="widget-inner"> <h3 class="widget-header"> <a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/profile"> Profile</a> </h3> <div class="widget-content"> <div class="user-pic"></div>  <dl class="profile-list widget-list"> <dd class="profile-username item"><span  class="ljuser  i-ljuser  i-ljuser-type-P     "  lj:user="real_lawyer" ><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/profile"  target="_self"  class="i-ljuser-profile" ><img  class="i-ljuser-userhead"  src="http://l-stat.livejournal.net/img/userinfo.gif?v=17080?v=129.4" /></a><a href="http://real-lawyer.livejournal.com/" class="i-ljuser-username"   target="_self"   ><b>real_lawyer</b></a></span></dd> <dd class="profile-name item">LitaWrites</dd> </dl> </div> </div> </div> <div class="calendar-widget widget"> <div
